task:task.name: TPICsPeakSummary
task:task.description: TPICs peak call processing for ChIPseqPipeline.

program.executable: awk -v OFS="\t" '$1=$1' ${TestName}/TPIC.final.bed > ${TestName}/${SampleName}_final_TPICS.bed awk -v OFS="\t" '$1=$1' ${TestName}/TPIC.bed > ${TestName}/${SampleName}_TPIC.bed ${bedtools}/intersectBed -wb -a ${TestName}/${SampleName}_final_TPICS.bed -b ${TestName}/${SampleName}_TPIC.bed | awk '{print $1 "\t" $2 "\t" $3 "\t" $7/$8 "\t" $9}' | ${bedtools}/groupBy -c 4,5 -o mean,mean > ${TestName}/${SampleName}_Temp_TPICS_Peaks.bed sort -k1,1V -k2,2g ${TestName}/${SampleName}_Temp_TPICS_Peaks.bed > ${TestName}/${SampleName}_Temp2_TPICS_Peaks.bed python ${pipelineBase}/PythonScripts/AddPeakNames.py ${TestName}/${SampleName}_Temp2_TPICS_Peaks.bed ${TestName}/${SampleName}_TPICS_Peaks.bed
